item.title: 市场上已经出现了HavelockAI的杀手级产品
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的贡献。无论内容如何，我们保证始终精彩纷呈。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 马斯克旗下xAI公司因Grok生成性内容遭加州总检察长调查
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克的人工智能初创公司xAI正受到加州总检察长办公室的调查，此前该公司旗下的Grok聊天机器人被指控未经同意就生成数千张女性和儿童的色情图像。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup, xAI, is under investigation by the California attorney general’s office after the company’s Grok chatbot was allegedly used to create thousands of sexualized images of women and children without their consent.】

item.title: 花旗集团第四季度财报五大看点
item.description: 以下是花旗集团第四季度财报的亮点。更多详情请点击此处查看我们的TOPLive博客。【原文：Here’s what we saw in Citigroup Inc.’s fourth-quarter earnings. For more, click here for our TOPLive blog.】

item.title: 特朗普的信用卡威胁为华尔街的盈利狂欢蒙上阴影
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普重返白宫引发市场大涨，交易活动进入高速运转状态，银行家们拥抱特朗普的一切政策以赚取巨额利润。【原文：Donald Trump’s return to the White House unleashed a market rally, dealmaking went into overdrive, and bankers embraced all things Trump to rake in the big money.】

item.title: 英国央行拉姆斯登称需对对冲基金的英国国债杠杆采取行动
item.description: 英国央行副行长戴夫·拉姆斯登表示，英国需要采取行动应对对冲基金在英国国债市场积累的杠杆规模，此举释放出明确信号，表明官员们希望加强监管力度。【原文：The UK needs to take action on how much leverage has been accumulated by hedge funds in the gilt market, said Bank of England deputy governor Dave Ramsden, sending a clear signal that officials want to enforce greater oversight.】

item.title: 美国国债30年期收益率在避险需求推动下延续跌势
item.description: 美国国债价格上涨，推动30年期国债收益率降至今年迄今最低水平，这主要受到避险需求和债券供应因素的共同影响。【原文：A rise in US Treasuries pushed the 30-year bond’s yield to the lowest level so far this year amid haven demand and bond supply considerations.】

item.title: 2026年矿业股攀升，投资者追逐避风港
item.description: 矿业股在年初大幅上涨，此前黄金、白银和铜价周三均创下历史新高，延续了由地缘政治紧张局势和避险资产需求回升推动的涨势。【原文：Mining stocks jumped at the start of the year after gold, silver and copper all hit record highs Wednesday, extending a rally fueled by geopolitical tension and renewed demand for safe-haven assets.】

item.title: 微软关闭协助诈骗者窃取数百万美元的诈骗网站
item.description: 攻击者利用了盗版软件。【原文：Attackers leveraged pirated software.】

item.title: 台湾官员赴华盛顿推进贸易协定
item.description: 据知情人士透露，台湾高层官员正前往华盛顿，旨在推动一项长期搁置的协议——该协议旨在降低美国对这个自治岛屿出口商品的关税，并促进对美国的投资。【原文：Top Taiwanese officials are traveling to Washington to advance a long-stalled agreement to lower US tariffs on the self-governing island’s exports and boost investment in America, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国执政党社民党批评汉莎航空与马斯克的星链达成协议
item.description: 德国执政联盟中的社会民主党批评德国汉莎航空公司与埃隆·马斯克支持的SpaceX公司达成使用星链卫星互联网网络的协议，称其本应选择德国电信等本土运营商。【原文：Germany’s co-ruling Social Democrats criticized Deutsche Lufthansa AG over its deal to use Elon Musk-backed SpaceX’s Starlink satellite internet network, saying it should have chosen a domestic operator like Deutsche Telekom AG.】

item.title: 比尔特推出10%封顶信用卡，响应特朗普要求
item.description: 比尔特奖励计划正推出三款新信用卡，利率上限为10%，此举发生在特朗普总统威胁未采取此措施的贷款机构数日之后。【原文：Bilt Rewards is unveiling three new credit cards with interest rates capped at 10%, days after President Donald Trump threatened lenders that failed to do so.】

item.title: 纽约市称DoorDash和优步司机被克扣5.5亿美元小费
item.description: 据纽约市机构发布的报告显示，DoorDash公司和优步科技公司通过更改应用程序界面，已剥夺纽约外卖配送员超过5.5亿美元的小费收入。【原文：DoorDash Inc. and Uber Technologies Inc. have deprived New York delivery workers of more than $550 million in tips after changing the interfaces on their apps, according to findings released in a report from a city agency.】

item.title: 英格兰银行或将把稳定币视同银行存款予以保护，拉姆斯登表示
item.description: 英国央行官员戴夫·拉姆斯登表示，英国可能需要像保障民众在银行的常规储蓄一样，为稳定币存款提供担保。【原文：Britain may need to back up stablecoin deposits in the same way that it guarantees people’s regular savings in banks, according to Bank of England official Dave Ramsden.】

item.title: 欧盟称允许各国将铜缆网络关停时间推迟至2035年
item.description: 据知情人士透露，欧盟委员会拟允许成员国将铜质电信网络的关闭期限推迟至2035年，为行业向更高速的光纤网络转型争取更多时间。【原文：The European Commission is set to allow member states to delay the switch-off of copper telecommunications networks to 2035, giving the industry more time to make the transition to faster fiber networks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国税务海关总署逮捕六人，涉家园房地产投资信托基金3亿英镑欺诈案
item.description: 英国严重欺诈办公室表示，已逮捕六名涉嫌犯罪人员，涉案金额约3亿英镑（合4.04亿美元），案件与社会住房公司Home REIT Plc的"混乱倒闭"有关。【原文：The UK’s Serious Fraud Office said it arrested six people over suspected offenses totaling about £300 million ($404 million) linked to the “chaotic downfall” of social housing firm Home REIT Plc.】

item.title: 巴西金融科技公司Agibank计划在美国IPO募资10亿美元
item.description: 知情人士透露，巴西金融科技公司Agibank周三在美国提交了首次公开募股申请，计划筹集约10亿美元资金。【原文：Brazilian fintech Agibank filed for an initial public equity offering in the US on Wednesday and is aiming to raise about $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗首席执行官警告将进一步裁员，呼吁摒弃"陈旧恶习"
item.description: 简·弗雷泽正着手改变花旗集团的落后文化。【原文：Jane Fraser is calling time on Citigroup Inc.’s laggard culture.】

item.title: 三色债券持有人起诉受托人，指控其隐瞒涉嫌欺诈行为
item.description: 去年因欺诈指控倒闭的二手车经销商兼次级贷款机构Tricolor Holdings的债券投资者，已对证券受托人威明顿信托公司提起诉讼，指控该机构未能履行关键债券监督职责。【原文：Investors in bonds from Tricolor Holdings, a used car dealer and subprime lender that collapsed last year amid allegations of fraud, sued Wilmington Trust NA, the trustee for the securities, alleging the firm failed in key bond supervision duties.】

item.title: 谷歌Gemini能主动分析用户的Gmail、照片和搜索记录
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet宣布，其Gemini人工智能助手现可主动调用用户在Gmail、搜索、照片和YouTube等服务中的数据，旨在提升面向消费者的AI产品个性化体验。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google said its Gemini artificial intelligence assistant can now proactively tap into users’ data across Gmail, Search, Photos and YouTube, an attempt to make its consumer-facing AI product more personalized.】

item.title: 台积电股价飙升迫使交易员另寻股票押注新途径
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司股价的飙升行情令投资者陷入进退维谷的境地，因多头仓位过于拥挤，使得多空双方都难以对该股进行新的押注。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s blistering rally has left investors boxed in, as crowded long positions make it difficult for both bulls and bears to place fresh bets on the stock.】

item.title: 特斯拉在印度遭遇挫折，未售出的Model Y SUV车型开始打折促销
item.description: 知情人士透露，特斯拉公司正努力处理去年进口到印度的首批车辆中约三分之一，因为部分早前预订的潜在买家已退出交易。【原文：Tesla Inc. is struggling to offload about a third of the initial vehicles it imported to India last year, as some prospective buyers who made early bookings have backed out, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 直觉外科股价下跌，因竞争对手放缓旗舰机器人业务
item.description: 直觉外科公司股价创下9月以来最大跌幅，此前这家外科机器人制造商预测，随着竞争对手推出新产品，其旗舰外科机器人系统今年的使用量增长将放缓。【原文：Intuitive Surgical Inc. shares fell the most since September after the surgical robot maker forecast slower growth for use of its flagship surgical robotic system system this year as rivals bring new products to market.】

item.title: 油轮保险费飙升预示黑海局势日益动荡
item.description: 穿越黑海的船舶保险成本再度飙升，不断升级的袭击事件凸显了该地区运输商品风险日益加剧。【原文：The cost of insuring ships sailing through the Black Sea is surging again, as spiraling attacks on vessels underscore the growing risk of hauling commodities through the region.】

item.title: 劳动力短缺或阻碍电厂建设，奥克洛首席执行官表示
item.description: 核能企业奥克洛公司警告称，技术工人短缺正威胁成为新建核电站进程中的瓶颈。【原文：Nuclear company Oklo Inc. is warning that shortages of skilled workers are threatening to become a bottleneck in efforts to build new power plants.】

item.title: 币安现货加密货币交易市场份额跌至2021年初以来最低点
item.description: 随着竞争对手抢占市场份额，以及交易者转向新的数字资产买卖方式，币安在全球加密货币交易领域的掌控力正在减弱。【原文：Binance’s grip on global crypto trading is weakening as rivals pick up market share and traders shift to new ways of buying and selling digital assets.】

item.title: 英国政府借贷成本降至2024年12月以来最低水平
item.description: 英国基准债券价格上涨，收益率降至2024年12月以来最低水平，此前债券发售需求强劲且经济增长放缓迹象显现。【原文：The UK’s benchmark bonds rallied to send yields to the lowest since December 2024, following healthy demand for a debt sale and signs of slowing economic growth.】

item.title: 英国男子因涉嫌黑客交易计划面临美国引渡
item.description: 一名英国公民因涉嫌经营"黑客交易"计划，在伦敦败诉后面临被引渡至美国的命运。【原文：A British national, accused of running a “hack-to-trade” scheme, is facing extradition to the US after losing a legal challenge in London.】

item.title: 美联储的米兰在主张降息的论据中加入了放松监管的论点
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰表示，特朗普政府的放松监管议程为央行继续降息提供了额外理由。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said the Trump administration’s deregulatory agenda offers the central bank an additional reason to continue lowering interest rates.】

item.title: Virtu与Optiver据称联手对抗Citadel Securities在美国期权交易流领域的竞争
item.description: 四家做市商联手支持一家从零售经纪商处收购美国期权订单流的公司，此举撼动了为股票市场快速增长领域提供流动性的高利润业务。【原文：Four market making firms have joined forces to back a firm buying US options order flow from retail brokers, shaking up the lucrative business of providing liquidity to a fast-growing corner of the equity market.】

item.title: 凯雷集团考虑收购本·戴尔旗下联邦液化天然气公司股权
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募股权公司凯雷集团正考虑投资本·戴尔旗下金梅里奇能源管理公司持有的联邦液化天然气公司。【原文：Private equity firm Carlyle Group Inc. is considering investing in Commonwealth LNG, owned by Ben Dell’s Kimmeridge Energy Management Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】
